mapper.select: SELECT sName, sId, sType, sSex, sIdNumber, sAddress, sTel, sUsername, sPwd FROM staff
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO staff(sName, sId, sType, sSex, sIdNumber, sAddress, sTel, sUsername, sPwd) VALUES (#{sName},#{sId},#{sType},#{sSex},#{sIdNumber},#{sAddress},#{sTel},#{sUsername},#{sPwd})
mapper.select: SELECT sName, sId, sType, sSex, sIdNumber, sAddress, sTel, sUsername, sPwd FROM staff WHERE sUsername=#{sUserName}
SELECT sName, sId, sType, sSex, sIdNumber, sAddress, sTel, sUsername, sPwd FROM staff WHERE sId=#{sId}
SELECT sType FROM staff WHERE sId=#{sId}

SELECT sName, sId, sType, sSex, sIdNumber, sAddress, sTel, sUsername, sPwd FROM staff WHERE sId IN (select selectproject.sId FROM selectproject where selectproject.pId=#{pId}) AND sType=#{type}+3 OR sType=#{type}+6 sType=1 OR sType=2 Or sType=3

SELECT sName, sId, sType, sSex, sIdNumber, sAddress, sTel, sUsername, sPwd From staff WHERE CONCAT_WS(`sName`, `sId`, `sType`, `sSex`, `sIdNumber`, `sAddress`, `sTel`,`sUsername`) like CONCAT('%',#{keyWord},'%')
